head.prefix: og: http://ogp.me/ns# fb: http://ogp.me/ns/fb# object: http://ogp.me/ns/object# article: http://ogp.me/ns/article# profile: http://ogp.me/ns/profile#

a.data-ga-click: Header, click, Nav menu - item:pulls context:user
Header, click, Nav menu - item:issues context:user

a.class: header-nav-link notification-indicator tooltipped tooltipped-s js-socket-channel js-notification-indicator

a.data-ga-click: Header, go to profile, text:your profile
Header, go to starred repos, text:your stars

button.title: Unstar neovim/neovim.github.io
button.data-ga-click: Repository, click unstar button, action:blob#show; text:Unstar

button.title: Star neovim/neovim.github.io
button.data-ga-click: Repository, click star button, action:blob#show; text:Star

a.title: Fork your own copy of neovim/neovim.github.io to your account
a.aria-label: Fork your own copy of neovim/neovim.github.io to your account
a.data-ga-click: Repository, show fork modal, action:blob#show; text:Fork

div.h2: Where should we fork this repository?

a.data-selected-links: repo_source repo_downloads repo_commits repo_releases repo_tags repo_branches /neovim/neovim.github.io

button.class: js-zeroclipboard btn btn-sm BtnGroup-item tooltipped tooltipped-s

div.h2: Users who have contributed to this file

a.class: btn btn-sm BtnGroup-item tooltipped tooltipped tooltipped-n source
btn btn-sm BtnGroup-item tooltipped tooltipped-n rendered selected

button.aria-label: Fork this project and edit the file
Fork this project and delete the file

div.div: Sorry, we cannot display this file.
Sorry, this file is invalid so it cannot be displayed.

body.div: You can't perform that action at this time.

div.class: js-stale-session-flash stale-session-flash flash flash-warn flash-banner d-none
div.span: You signed in with another tab or window. Reload to refresh your session.
You signed out in another tab or window. Reload to refresh your session.
